title: Goddesses: Hubble, Bubble, Toil and Trouble
description: A tale of ancient Goddesses rediscovering their powers in the present day, finding out the Universe has conspired against them and conjured newbie Goddesses out of mere mortals. The fate of magic and the world as we know it hangs by a thread. Unmissable two endings - one for the optimists, another for the pessimists.
author: Sky Sommers
